page.title: 09Things to to in our block(1)
page.content: My name is Andrew and I live on a big housing estate called the Gurnos.My teacher told us that there are about 5000 people living here.The children in my class set out to find how people spend their spare time.We started with the children.In our school there is a cub troop and a brownie troop.There is also a disco sometimes.I think these should be held every week.There is a community centre on the estate with judo and keep fit classes.They have just started building a BMX track which will be good.Near our estate is Cyfarthfa Park where there are play- grounds and there is a lake where you can go fishing.The playgrounds on the estate have been vandalised.My hobbies are rollerskating & reading.I have to go to Merthyr to go to the rollerdisco which is great fun.I also have to travel to Merthyr to go to a library.
